commit.message:
re PR bootstrap/26053 (Misdetection of COMDAT group support with GNU as and non-GNU ld)

	PR bootstrap/26053
	* configure.ac (HAVE_COMDAT_GROUP): Don't assume non-GNU linkers
	support COMDAT group.
	* configure: Regenerate.

From-SVN: r110985

+	PR bootstrap/26053

+	support COMDAT group.
+	* configure: Regenerate.
+
